plot outline: This movie is based on the the theme Whatever you believe is true, who told you that it is true. Whatever you believe is a lie, who told you that it is a lie. It is a unique screenplay based on the lies told by different people at different points of time and how unforeseen circumstances force people to lie, which eventually takes an ugly turn.
title: Avasaraniko Abaddam
plot: This movie is based on the the theme Whatever you believe is true, who told you that it is true. Whatever you believe is a lie, who told you that it is a lie. It is a unique screenplay based on the lies told by different people at different points of time and how unforeseen circumstances force people to lie, which eventually takes an ugly turn.
